name: HVRGUN
description: Welcome to HVRGUN, the worlds best Assault Pilot Training program. Where you'll be placed directly into a virtual battlefield and test your ability to dodge, shoot, and destroy an endless onslaught of enemies!
minimum_requirements: OS: windows 7 sp1 or newer Processor: Intel i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350 equivalent or greater Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce® GTX 970 / AMD Radeon™ R9 290 equivalent or greater DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 500 MB available space
